pages.text:
LET US HOST YOUR NEXT EVENT
The Fitz Bar + Lounge is the perfect venue for hassle-free networking events and parties large or small. Talk to us about how we can help you plan your next gathering.
Discover Ft. Lauderdale’s coolest hidden gem. Located in the Tarpon River Entertainment District, we are pouring good drinks, food and fun into the neighborhood. Check out our monthly calendar of events and happenings.
TUESDAY
TEQUILA TUESDAY
LA CONDESA TAQUERIA FOOD TRUCK
WEDNESDAY

20% OFF ANY LIQUOR OR SPIRIT FEATURED ON OUR WALL

ALL LEVELS WELCOME. 7PM + 9PM SEATINGS
EVERY FRIDAY
